name: Bardo Pond & Rumour Cubes - Live at Nambucca [2nd August 2012]
description: Bardo Pond & Rumour Cubes live at Nambucca, 2nd August 2012. Tickets will be sent in the post. Venue: http://www.nambuccalondon.com/ BARDO POND http://www.bardopond.org/ Bardo Pond was the flagship band of Philly’s “Psychedelphia” space rock movement, which also included the likes of Aspera, Asteroid No. 4, the Azusa Plane, and tangentially the Lilys. RUMOUR CUBES http://www.rumourcubes.com Rumour Cubes are a London-based six-piece creating atmospheric instrumental music. Working with poets and film makers and writing custom music software to sync videos to their live performances, the band construct a multimedia experience where dense ambient textures and intricate rhythms underlie beautiful melodies highlighted by violin and viola.
